channel.title: PvPNation |Factions|Mcmmo|Raiding|Grief| pvpnation.zapto.org:25965
channel.description:
Welcome to PvPNation! This is a hardcore factions server! Join now and gather supplies to either defend yourself, or go for an attack! Griefing other factions is encouraged and Tnt isON!!
IP: pvpnation.zapto.org:25965
Ranks [Owner] [Admin] [Moderator] [Trial-Moderator] [Player]
Donator Ranks King- $65 Titan- $45 Knight- $30 Warrior- $20 Hunter- $15 Scavenger- $5
Donation Rewards King- /kit king, /weather sun and storm, /md creeper, /md squid, /nick, Priority Staff Support, $25,000 in-game money and anything that the lower donation ranks have!
Titan- /kit titan, /back, /md cow, /ci, /time, $17,500 in-game money and anything that the lower ranks have!
Knight- /kit kinght, /md chicken, /weather sun, $10,000 in-game money and anything that the lower donation ranks get!
Warrior- /kit warrior, /md pig, /tpahere, ability to ask for a peaceful(non-pvp) faction, $6,500 in-game money, a shop plot and anything that the lower donation ranks get!
Hunter- /kit hunter, /md sheep, $3000 in-game money and anything that the lower donation ranks get!
Scavenger- /kit scavenger, /tpa and $1,500 in-game money! *NOTICE*: The in-game money you earn with a donator rank will be subtracted from the money you earn from a higher donator rank if you donate for that rank.
